title: 103_hr2676
content: SSI Reform Act of 1993 - Amends title XVI (SSI) of the Social Security Act to: (1) increase the limit on the amount of income and resources needed to qualify for SSI, (2) increase the amount of SSI benefits payable. (3) eliminate certain resource exclusions and increase certain earned income exclusions, (4) disregard in-kind support and maintenance in determining income, and (5) phase-in an expansion of eligibility based on age.
